name: Blocks (itch) (Chemist02)
description:
The story of a young penguin who wakes up on a sentient mattress.

Mechanics:

  • Attack foes by stacking blocks while ensuring your tower doesn't grow out of control.

Software used:

  • Unity
  • GIMP
  • LMMS
  • Audacity
  • Bfxr

All assets were made by me, with the exception of the following:

  • https://rhythm-lab.com/amen_breaks/
  • https://gist.github.com/ftvs/5822103
